snippet.title: Sonic the Hedgehog's Gameworld (Sega Pico)
snippet.description:
Journey with me into the fantastical world of Sonic the Hedgehog's Gameworld on the Pico, undoubtedly Sega's finest and most underrated console, through the magic of sub-par capturing techniques and shoddy editing. 

Played and recorded on a real, live Sega Pico. No emulator jazz here. Picture-in-picture included to demonstrate the entire experience.
